headline: The Unstopables™ Unlimited Collection Expands with Three New Scents, a Jasmine Tookes Exclusive Sweepstakes, and an Immersive Pop-Up Experience
summary: CINCINNATI, September 10, 2025--Unstopables Unlimited, the collection that redefined sophistication in laundry fragrances, is expanding its acclaimed lineup with three new designer-caliber scents: N.06, N.15, and N.24. Inspired by the artistry of fine perfumery and crafted by world-class perfumers within the Unstopables Vault, these new additions elevate laundry scent to a whole new level of complexity and luxury, while remaining accessible to all.

headline: Is Procter & Gamble (PG) Fairly Valued After a Year of Slower Returns?
summary: If you have been watching Procter & Gamble (PG) lately, you might have noticed some subtle but steady price moves that could be catching investors off guard. While there hasn't been a single headline-grabbing event to explain the change, anytime a global leader in consumer goods nudges up or down, it naturally prompts questions for both cautious holders and potential buyers. Over the past year, Procter & Gamble’s returns have slipped by 8% even as annual revenue and net income both continued...
